channel.title: What is the current Market Cap of XRD?
channel.description:
You can find the up to date Market Cap of XRD on the following websites:
* [CoinGecko](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/radix) * [Radix Dashboard by Avaunt Staking](https://www.radixdashboard.com/) * [RadixScan](https://radixscan.com/) * *[CoinMarketCap - unverified](https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/radix-protocol/)*
